ComicInfo.Summary: Somehow, using a black-tie gala to gather her former clients together and make them fear her enough to exert their political influence didn't go as planned for Celia. She's been taken captive, and it seems that her penchant for hiding in plain sight has finally come back to haunt her. To make things worse, there's a mysterious force out there working with Celia's clients to bring her down, and it seems like all may finally be lost!
